ai.question: Which three items are considered to be WAN devices? (Choose three.)
Which layer of the hierarchical network design model is often referred to as the backbone?

form-item.ai: <questtestinjterop><item ident="117239" title="not used in brown trout" type="interactiveType1" usage="Default"><components><!-- *********** OPTIONS *********** --><component ident="1" movable="yes" snappable="no" displaytype="text"><textcomponent textrows="3" textwidth="332"><material><mattext>A switching technology where each switch must evaluate the address of the packet to determine where to send it. </mattext></material></textcomponent></component><component ident="2" movable="yes" snappable="no" displaytype="text"><textcomponent textrows="3" textwidth="332"><material><mattext>A switching technology where a virtual circuit is only physically in existence while a packet is traveling through it.</mattext></material></textcomponent></component><component ident="3" movable="yes" snappable="no" displaytype="text"><textcomponent textrows="3" textwidth="332"><material><mattext>A switching technology that establishes routes through the switches for particular end-to-end connections.</mattext></material></textcomponent></component><component ident="4" movable="yes" snappable="no" displaytype="text"><textcomponent textrows="3" textwidth="332"><material><mattext>A switching technology that has a pre-established dedicated circuit (or channel) between nodes and terminals.</mattext></material></textcomponent></component> <!-- *********** LABELS *********** --> <!-- *********** TARGETS *********** --><component ident="1" movable="no" snappable="yes" displaytype="text"><textcomponent textrows="3" textwidth="300"><material><mattext>Circuit Switching</mattext></material></textcomponent></component><component ident="2" movable="no" snappable="yes" displaytype="text"><textcomponent textrows="3" textwidth="300"><material><mattext>Packet Switching</mattext></material></textcomponent></component><component ident="3" movable="no" snappable="yes" displaytype="text"><textcomponent textrows="3" textwidth="300"><material><mattext>Connection-oriented Packet Switching</mattext></material></textcomponent></component><component ident="4" movable="no" snappable="yes" displaytype="text"><textcomponent textrows="3" textwidth="300"><material><mattext>Connectionless Packet Switching</mattext></material></textcomponent></component> <!-- *********** STEM <questtestinjterop><item ident="117297" title="not used in brown trout" type="interactiveType1" usage="Default"><components><!-- *********** OPTIONS *********** --><component ident="1" movable="yes" snappable="no" displaytype="text"><textcomponent textrows="3" textwidth="332"><material><mattext>Provides a high-bandwidth Layer 2 network capable of managing data, voice, and video all on the same infrastructure</mattext></material></textcomponent></component><component ident="2" movable="yes" snappable="no" displaytype="text"><textcomponent textrows="3" textwidth="332"><material><mattext>Built on a cell-based architecture in which the cell has a fixed length of 53 bytes</mattext></material></textcomponent></component><component ident="3" movable="yes" snappable="no" displaytype="text"><textcomponent textrows="3" textwidth="332"><material><mattext>Operates at the data link layer, and the PVC is identified by a Data Link Control Identifier (DLCI)</mattext></material></textcomponent></component><component ident="4" movable="yes" snappable="no" displaytype="text"><textcomponent textrows="3" textwidth="332"><material><mattext>Operates at the network layer, and the SVC is identified by a channel number</mattext></material></textcomponent></component> <!-- *********** LABELS *********** --> <!-- *********** TARGETS *********** ai.question: Which device is commonly used as Data Terminal Equipment?
Which type of WAN connection should be chosen when a dedicated point-to-point WAN communications path from the customer premises through the provider network to a remote destination is required?
How are Frame Relay virtual circuits identified?
What WAN technology is designed for delivering data, voice, and video simultaneously over a TDM infrastructure?

Which architecture enables enterprises to offer important network services, such as security, new communication services, and improved application performance to every office regardless of its size or proximity to headquarters?
At which layer of the hierarchical design model do users connect to the network?
ISDN PRI is composed of how many B channels in North America?
The ability to connect securely to a private network over a public network is provided by which WAN technology?
Which hierarchical design model layer is responsible for containing network problems to the workgroups in which they occur?
Which term describes the cabling that connects the customer site to the nearest exchange of the WAN service provider?
Which goal can be accomplished by the implementation of the Cisco Enterprise Teleworker Architecture?

choice.text: It allows the enterprise to add large branch sites that span large geographic areas.
It allows the enterprise to deliver secure voice and data services to workers no matter where or when they work.
In order to reduce remote security threats, it forces users who are located at main sites to log on to resources.
It satisfies telephony requirements for users who are located at medium to large enterprise sites.
